The Power of Empathy, Helen Reiss, MD, Massachusetts General Hospital, Harvard Medical School (3.82 MB)

Directions:  Click on each block below  to explore these powerful conveyors of connection.

How to Fire Up Our Empathic Brains

The Emotional Balcony

It's all about connection.

 

E.M.P.A.T.H.Y is a powerful acronym to help you learn to be more empathic by recognizing key nonverbal cues and facial expressions in others as well as dealing with your own physiological responses to highly emotional encounters.  

 

Each letter describes a key piece of how we connect with people.
